item.title: Profile
item.description: Mitsuhiko TOKOYODA (birth name: Mitsuhiko SHIMOMURA) shimomura[at]hapis.k.u-tokyo.ac.jp I’m interested in haptics and programming. Affiliation Shinoda & Makino Group, Department of Complexity Science and Engineering, Graduate School of Frontier Sciences, The University of Tokyo Educational History Apr. 2021 - M.S., Department of Information Physics and Computing, Graduate School of Information Science and Technology, The University of Tokyo, Japan Apr. 2019 - Mar.
